bibl.title: A Demotic School Exercice in Two Copies.
bibl.note: New edition and commentary of O. Stras. dém. Inv. 5 (= LDAB 52208) and O. Leid. Inv. 487 (= LDAB 49513). Both ostraca contain the same list of body parts.
bibl.seg: Willy Clarysse, A Demotic School Exercice in Two Copies.
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 81-83, 2 fac-sim.
New edition and commentary of O. Stras. dém. Inv. 5 (= LDAB 52208) and O. Leid. Inv. 487 (= LDAB 49513). Both ostraca contain the same list of body parts.
